name: Aurelion Sol
title: The Star Forger
lore: Aurelion Sol once graced the vast emptiness of the cosmos with celestial wonders of his own devising. Now, he is forced to wield his awesome power at the behest of a space-faring empire that tricked him into servitude. Desiring a return to his star-forging ways, Aurelion Sol will drag the very stars from the sky, if he must, in order to regain his freedom.
blurb: Aurelion Sol once graced the vast emptiness of the cosmos with celestial wonders of his own devising. Now, he is forced to wield his awesome power at the behest of a space-faring empire that tricked him into servitude. Desiring a return to his ...
allytips_0: You can use Comet of Legend's flight to grow Starsurge to massive proportions.
allytips_1: Save Voice of Light to use as a defense against melee opponents if you need to - otherwise, use its slow to start a fight at long range.
allytips_2: Comet of Legend allows you to move quickly around the map; use it to put pressure on other lanes.
enemytips_0: Try to get inside his orbit, since his stars can't hurt you up close.
enemytips_1: His stars disappear while stunned or silenced, giving you an easy opportunity to fight him.
enemytips_2: He gains speed while chasing in a straight line, but taking damage makes him lose that momentum.
enemytips_3: His Starsurge ability can grow to cover a huge area - don't stay in the same place too long!

{"name":"Comet of Legend","description":"Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can eventually take off flying for a long distance.","sanitizedDescription":"Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can eventually take off flying for a long distance.","tooltip":"Passive: Generate Escape Velocity while moving. Continuously moving in one direction grants increasing Movement Speed up to {{ e2 }}%.

Taking champion or turret damage resets this passive.

Active: At 100 Escape Velocity, fly for {{ e3 }} units in the chosen direction or until clicking to move. Aurelion Sol can see and be seen over walls while flying.

Taking champion or turret damage will force a landing.
